answers.answer: I responded on the type 2 board. But no, it doesn't work like that. However, if she continues eating that way she will become obese as well as have many health problems, diabetes (type 2, not type 1 which is an autoimmune disorder) is only one possibility. Eat healthy to have a healthy life.
high sugar levels,,,, if a poor diet continues ....that could contribute to diabetes. Get informed..ask your DR. Good luck. MaritimeFox

question: my sister ate like 6 packs of rice krispies bars for like 2 weeks everyday.can this cause diabetes?
title: diabetes?
